name: Cyber Rush
description:
THIS GAME USES COPYRIGHT FREE MUSIC ONLY

Every year, a sadistic dictator picks out a few people from his country to be a Cyber Warrior. You have been picked. Now you have to compete in the arenas of Cyber Rush... UNTIL DEATH!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Mouse Click: Shoot

E (Near the center of the arena after all enemies have been vanquished): Go to next arena.

How To Play:

Move, dodge bullets and shoot till all your foes are vanquished. Then on to the next level and do it all again. Only the top scorer of this treacherous competition gets to keep thier life. 

Features
  • Each Playthrough is Unique!
    • Semi-Procedural level generation and enemy placement
  • Difficulty System
    • Enemies become tougher the further you progress
  • Online Leaderboard
    • Compete against yourself and everyone online to get the highest score!
  • 3 Unique Enemies
    • Rover Enemy
      • Mindless and most common enemy. Will shoot in your general direction
    • Drone Enemy
      • Stalks you and shoots deadly and fast projectiles
    • Laser Turret Enemy
      • The most dangerous! Will shoot a deadly laser beam when it sees you. But it cannot move. 
Interpretation of the theme:

You compete against yourself and other people on an online leaderboard to get the highest score. 

Team
  • Nexoan
  • HummusMan
  • Shines
